abstract: Berkshire Hathaway reported a 14 percent increase in second-quarter profit as the improving stock market lifted the value of derivative contracts and its investments.
snippet: Berkshire Hathaway reported a 14 percent increase in second-quarter profit as the improving stock market lifted the value of derivative contracts and its investments.
lead_paragraph: Berkshire Hathaway returned to profitability in the second quarter on gains in derivatives tied to world equity markets.

headline.main: Berkshire Posts Profit After a Rare Loss
headline.print_headline: Berkshire Posts Profit After a Rare Loss
